fn.p: The authors declare no conflict of interest.
This article is a PNAS Direct Submission.
Data deposition: The raw sequence data from this study have been deposited at the European Nucleotide Archive (ENA), https://www.ebi.ac.uk/ena (accession no. PRJEB29086).
This article contains supporting information online at www.pnas.org/lookup/suppl/doi:10.1073/pnas.1820663116/-/DCSupplemental.
